name: Classic Waffle
description: A simple, golden, crispy waffle served with syrup and butter.

name: Chocolate Waffle
description: A rich waffle topped with melted chocolate and whipped cream.

name: Berry Waffle
description: A fresh waffle topped with mixed berries and a drizzle of honey.

name: Banana Nut Waffle
description: A waffle topped with sliced bananas, walnuts, and caramel sauce.

name: Caramel Waffle
description: A crispy waffle drizzled with rich caramel sauce and a sprinkle of sea salt.

name: Peanut Butter Waffle
description: A waffle with peanut butter spread and chocolate chips, topped with whipped cream.
